actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

official_title: A resolution to express the concern of the House of Representatives over the continued repression of religious freedom in the Soviet Union.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Declares that Soviet authorities should: (1) honor the provisions of the Helsinki Final Act; (2) respect the human rights of Soviet citizens; and (3) free all Prisoners of Conscience and permit their emigration.

titles.title: A resolution to express the concern of the House of Representatives over the continued repression of religious freedom in the Soviet Union.
